questions.question: What alias contacted Damian first?
questions.hint: Check exported chat logs in Documents/Communications.

questions.question: Which file logs the first message?
questions.hint: It’s a JSON file in the Communications folder.

questions.question: Which registry key shows Damian as the apprentice?
questions.hint: Check the Registry folder for .reg files.

questions.question: What value is set for the 'Role' key?
What BTC amount was transferred?
questions.hint: Inspect the .csv file in the Crypto folder.

questions.question: What is the wallet address found?
questions.hint: It’s in the same Transactions.csv file.

questions.question: What was the name of the deleted folder accessed?
questions.hint: Correlate shellbag activity with deleted folders.

questions.question: What was the name of the final whisper audio file?
What phrase was hidden in the audio?
questions.hint: Reverse the .wav file using Audacity or similar.

questions.question: What file exists inside the mounted VHD?
What does FinalApprentice.txt say?
questions.hint: Open the text file after mounting.
